abstract.t: As part of the LEMONADE work to define extensions to the IMAPv4 Rev1 protocol [RFC3501] and SMTP that provide optimizations in a variety of settings, the this document describes an alternative, optional binding for IMAPv4 and SMTP showing how HTTP can be used to transfer commands and responses. This binding is intended to facilitate the use of IMAP and SMTP in deployments involving a variety of intermediaries. A binding to SOAP is also provided.
